sql: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS typical_european_movie FROM company_type AS ct, info_type AS it, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info AS mi, title AS t WHERE ct.kind  = 'production companies' AND mc.note  like '%(theatrical)%' and mc.note like '%(France)%' AND mi.info  IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German') AND t.production_year > 2005 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND it.id = mi.info_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mi mc ct t it)
 HashJoin(mi mc ct t)
 MergeJoin(mc ct t)
 HashJoin(mc ct)
 BitmapScan(mi)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 BitmapScan(ct)
 IndexScan(t)
 BitmapScan(it)
 Leading(((mi ((mc ct) t)) it)) */
